alert.note: Alert for Madison; Onondaga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 20 at 8:19PM EST until November 21 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. * WHERE...Northern portions of Onondaga and Madison counties. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This lake effect snow event is winding down. However, an additional 1 to 2 inches will still occur overnight in far northern Onondaga and Madison Counties as the lake effect finishes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
